summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to accept and execute a grant agreement with the Institute of Museum and Library Services (IMLS) for a General Operating Support Grant for the Woodland Park Zoo; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 2000 Department of Parks and Recreation Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
